hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 83 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
catastrophe let's find out what it means
and how you can use it in your daily
conversation catastrophe there are times
when you face a tragedy or a misfortune
the word catastrophe basically means an
event resulting in a great loss or a
disaster some bad event that causes a
lot of suffering to many people is a
catastrophe it could be a natural
calamity such as a storm or an
earthquake so when you describe
something as catastrophic it means it is
something very bad or unsuccessful it is
a huge problem you have to deal with a
sudden violent change in the Earth's
surface is also known as catastrophe for
example the Japan's earthquake of 2011
was a catastrophe as it claimed lifes of
many people and left many homeless as
the word catastrophe means an unpleasant
event it is a noun when the word
catastrophic is used in a sentence it
describes something of being disaster s
so it's an adjective now that you know
what catastrophe means let's take a look
at some example sentences to see how you
can use it in your daily conversation
example one William was the only earning
member his death in a road accident was
a catastrophe for his family
example till the catastrophic hurricane
left the people helpless and devastated
example 3 Peter told his wife lack of
funds has resulted in a catastrophe for
our children's education
example 4
the heavy rains caused a catastrophic
flood in the city leading to massive
destruction example 5 the coach told his
team players this is our last chance it
would be a catastrophe if we didn't
qualify for the finals example 6 the
Black Sea is facing an ecological
catastrophe as a result of industrial
pollution example 7 the quarreling
ladies made the whole dinner party a
catastrophe example 8 the company's
catastrophic losses left the
shareholders displeased as they were not
entitled to any dividend this year
example 9 the sinking of the cargo ship
of the high sea was a major catastrophe
for the shipping company
example 10 the catastrophic effects of
global warming this resulted in changes
in the climatic conditions globally
that's the end of today's episode when

catastrophe and how did you deal with it
